section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Abu Usaid Ansari reported that he heard Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:The worthiest of the Ansar or the worthiest of the settlements and the clans of Ansar; the rest of the hadith is the same, but there is no mention of the story of Sa'd b. 'Ubida (Allah be pleased with him)
